title: Navratna Kundan Haar: A Symphony of Heritage and Elegance
materials: featuring meticulously set Kundan stones. Adorned with vibrant Navratna gemstones (Emerald
Zircon) reflecting astrological significance. Finished with delicate pearl drops.
features: This exquisite Kundan Haaram showcases the traditional art of stone setting. The centerpiece features a beautifully designed pendant studded with Navratnas in a floral motif. The gold-plated chain is intricately embellished with Kundan stones in a floral pattern, interspersed with delicate pearl drops, adding a touch of elegance. The design draws inspiration from classic temple jewelry (గుడి ఆభరణాలు) with a contemporary flair.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant gemstone hues of green (Emerald)
and iridescent white (Kundan & Pearl). This creates a rich and auspicious color palette.
occasions: and festive occasions. Ideal for a Seemantham (సీమంతం) or Half-Saree Function (లంగ ఓని ఫంక్షన్). Can also be styled for a modern fusion look.
description: Embrace tradition with this Navratna Kundan Haar, a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. Each gemstone holds astrological significance, making it a meaningful and beautiful piece. The intricate Kundan setting and durable gold-plated finish ensure lasting beauty. This Haaram is a versatile investment that will elevate any outfit.
